## Description

This site is created with WordPress.
Some parts of this site are arranged in a Gutenberg block style design.
## What's inside?

A quick look at the top-level files and directories you'll see in a WordPress project.

    .
    ├── images
    ├── editor-style.css

    ├── front-page.php
